document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5840">shut </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5840">door </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Lest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5840">beseeching </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff769c">face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ac4cff">Rejected </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
